verses.verse: פְּתַ֥ח <S%H6605><s%> Open לְבָנ֖וֹן <S%H3844><s%> O Lebanon דְּלָתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1817><s%> thy doors וְתֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> may devour אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> that the fire בַּאֲרָזֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H730><s%> thy cedars

הֵילֵ֤ל <S%H3213><s%> Howl בְּרוֹשׁ֙ <S%H1265><s%> fir tree כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָ֣פַל <S%H5307><s%> is fallen אֶ֔רֶז <S%H730><s%> for the cedar אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Because אַדִּרִ֖ים <S%H117><s%> because the mighty שֻׁדָּ֑דוּ <S%H7703><s%> are spoiled הֵילִ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H3213><s%> howl אַלּוֹנֵ֣י <S%H437><s%> O ye oaks בָשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יָרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> is come down יַ֥עַר <S%H3293><s%> for the forest [הַבָּצוּר כ] (הַבָּצִֽיר׃ <S%H1219><s%> cut off ק)

ק֚וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [There is] a voice יִֽלְלַ֣ת <S%H3215><s%> of the howling הָרֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> of the shepherds כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שֻׁדְּדָ֖ה <S%H7703><s%> is spoiled אַדַּרְתָּ֑ם <S%H155><s%> for their glory ק֚וֹל <S%H6963><s%> a voice שַׁאֲגַ֣ת <S%H7581><s%> of the roaring כְּפִירִ֔ים <S%H3715><s%> of young lions כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שֻׁדַּ֖ד <S%H7703><s%> is spoiled גְּא֥וֹן <S%H1347><s%> for the pride הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan ס

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> my God רְעֵ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> Feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> the flock הַהֲרֵגָֽה׃ <S%H2028><s%> of the slaughter

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who קֹנֵיהֶ֤ן <S%H7069><s%> Whose possessors יַֽהֲרְגֻן֙ <S%H2026><s%> slay וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יֶאְשָׁ֔מוּ <S%H816><s%> them and hold themselves not guilty וּמֹכְרֵיהֶ֣ן <S%H4376><s%> and they that sell יֹאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> them say בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD וַאעְשִׁ֑ר <S%H6238><s%> for I am rich וְרֹ֣עֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7462><s%> and their own shepherds לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יַחְמ֖וֹל <S%H2550><s%> pity עֲלֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will no אֶחְמ֥וֹל <S%H2550><s%> For I will no more pity ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I מַמְצִ֣יא <S%H4672><s%> but lo I will deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> the men אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> into his neighbour's וּבְיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> and into the hand מַלְכּ֔וֹ <S%H4428><s%> of his king וְכִתְּתוּ֙ <S%H3807><s%> and they shall smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will no אַצִּ֖יל <S%H5337><s%> I will not deliver מִיָּדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> and out of their hand

וָֽאֶרְעֶה֙ <S%H7462><s%> And I will feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> the flock הַֽהֲרֵגָ֔ה <S%H2028><s%> of slaughter לָכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> [even] you עֲנִיֵּ֣י <S%H6041><s%> O poor הַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> of the flock וָאֶקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> And I took לִ֞י שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> unto me two מַקְל֗וֹת <S%H4731><s%> staves לְאַחַ֞ד <S%H259><s%> the one קָרָ֤אתִי <S%H7121><s%> I called נֹ֙עַם֙ <S%H5278><s%> Beauty וּלְאַחַד֙ <S%H259><s%> and the other קָרָ֣אתִי <S%H7121><s%> I called חֹֽבְלִ֔ים <S%H2256><s%> band וָאֶרְעֶ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> and I fed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> the flock

וָאַכְחִ֛ד <S%H3582><s%> also I cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> Three הָרֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> shepherds בְּיֶ֣רַח <S%H3391><s%> month אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> in one וַתִּקְצַ֤ר <S%H7114><s%> lothed נַפְשִׁי֙ <S%H5315><s%> and my soul בָּהֶ֔ם וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also נַפְשָׁ֖ם <S%H5315><s%> them and their soul בָּחֲלָ֥ה <S%H973><s%> also abhorred בִֽי׃

וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> Then said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶרְעֶ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> I I will not feed אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> הַמֵּתָ֣ה <S%H4191><s%> you that that dieth תָמ֗וּת <S%H4191><s%> let it die וְהַנִּכְחֶ֙דֶת֙ <S%H3582><s%> and that that is to be cut off תִּכָּחֵ֔ד <S%H3582><s%> let it be cut off וְהַ֨נִּשְׁאָר֔וֹת <S%H7604><s%> and let the rest תֹּאכַ֕לְנָה <S%H398><s%> eat אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> every one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשַׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh רְעוּתָֽהּ׃ <S%H7468><s%> of another

וָאֶקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> And I took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַקְלִי֙ <S%H4731><s%> my staff אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֹ֔עַם <S%H5278><s%> [even] Beauty וָאֶגְדַּ֖ע <S%H1438><s%> and cut it asunder אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> לְהָפֵיר֙ <S%H6565><s%> that I might break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִ֔י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַ֖תִּי <S%H3772><s%> which I had made אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> with all the people

וַתֻּפַ֖ר <S%H6565><s%> And it was broken בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> me וַיֵּדְע֨וּ <S%H3045><s%> upon me knew כֵ֜ן <S%H3651><s%> and thus עֲנִיֵּ֤י <S%H6041><s%> and so the poor הַצֹּאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> of the flock הַשֹּׁמְרִ֣ים <S%H8104><s%> that waited אֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> that it [was] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> I

וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> And I said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If ט֧וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5869><s%> unto them If ye think הָב֥וּ <S%H3051><s%> give שְׂכָרִ֖י <S%H7939><s%> [me] my price וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֣א ׀ <S%H3808><s%> not חֲדָ֑לוּ <S%H2308><s%> and if not forbear וַיִּשְׁקְל֥וּ <S%H8254><s%> So they weighed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂכָרִ֖י <S%H7939><s%> for my price שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> [pieces] of silver

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me הַשְׁלִיכֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7993><s%> unto me Cast אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַיּוֹצֵ֔ר <S%H3335><s%> it unto the potter אֶ֣דֶר <S%H145><s%> a goodly הַיְקָ֔ר <S%H3366><s%> price אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יָקַ֖רְתִּי <S%H3365><s%> that I was prised at מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and וָֽאֶקְחָה֙ <S%H3947><s%> of them And I took שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> the thirty הַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [pieces] of silver וָאַשְׁלִ֥יךְ <S%H7993><s%> and cast אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַיּוֹצֵֽר׃ <S%H3335><s%> them to the potter

וָֽאֶגְדַּע֙ <S%H1438><s%> Then I cut asunder אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַקְלִ֣י <S%H4731><s%> staff הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> mine other אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַחֹֽבְלִ֑ים <S%H2256><s%> band לְהָפֵר֙ <S%H6565><s%> that I might break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאַחֲוָ֔ה <S%H264><s%> the brotherhood בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> between Judah וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> and Israel ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> unto me Take לְךָ֔ כְּלִ֖י <S%H3627><s%> unto thee yet the instruments רֹעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> shepherd אֱוִלִֽי׃ <S%H196><s%> of a foolish

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold אָנֹכִי֩ <S%H595><s%> I מֵקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> For lo I will raise up רֹעֶ֜ה <S%H7462><s%> a shepherd בָּאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land הַנִּכְחָד֤וֹת <S%H3582><s%> those that be cut off לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> who will not יִפְקֹד֙ <S%H6485><s%> [which] shall not visit הַנַּ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> babe לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <S%H1245><s%> neither shall seek וְהַנִּשְׁבֶּ֖רֶת <S%H7665><s%> that that is broken לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יְרַפֵּ֑א <S%H7495><s%> nor heal הַנִּצָּבָה֙ <S%H5324><s%> that that standeth לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יְכַלְכֵּ֔ל <S%H3557><s%> nor feed וּבְשַׂ֤ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh הַבְּרִיאָה֙ <S%H1277><s%> of the fat יֹאכַ֔ל <S%H398><s%> still but he shall eat וּפַרְסֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H6541><s%> their claws יְפָרֵֽק׃ <S%H6561><s%> in pieces ס

ה֣וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe רֹעִ֤י <S%H7473><s%> shepherd הָֽאֱלִיל֙ <S%H457><s%> to the idol עֹזְבִ֣י <S%H5800><s%> that leaveth הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> the flock חֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> will be on זְרוֹע֖וֹ <S%H2220><s%> [shall be] upon his arm וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> eye יְמִינ֑וֹ <S%H3225><s%> and upon his right זְרֹעוֹ֙ <S%H2220><s%> his arm יָב֣וֹשׁ <S%H3001><s%> shall be clean תִּיבָ֔שׁ <S%H3001><s%> dried up וְעֵ֥ין <S%H5869><s%> eye יְמִינ֖וֹ <S%H3225><s%> and his right כָּהֹ֥ה <S%H3543><s%> shall be utterly תִכְהֶֽה׃ <S%H3543><s%> darkened ס
